start.text: You look hurt. Let me see. I'm a doctor.

choices.text: [FirstAid] I have some medical training. Maybe I can help you with your other patients.

neutral_response.text: Alright, but be careful out there. A small wound can become a big problem if left untreated.

hostile_response.text: Suit yourself. But don't come crying to me when you're bleeding out.

positive_response.text: Of course. Let's get you patched up.

medicine_success.text: You know your way around a first-aid kit, I can tell. We can always use another pair of hands. What do you say?

end.text: Try to stay out of trouble.
